How it works

If you have an old non-running vehicle that you want to send to scrap, and at the same time, get cash for it, our company is glad to help you. There are three simple steps you need to complete:

  • Call Us

    You can contact us online or call our customer service department and tell us “I want to sell my junk car.” Our representative will ask basic questions about your junk car's year, make, model, mileage, and condition.

  • Get an Offer

    We will assess your vehicle and make an offer. We take care of all the paperwork. You can get the money in cash when picking up your car or check. You can be sure you will not face any hidden additional costs.

  • We Come to You

    After you have accepted the offer, our representatives will agree with you on when we can pick up your car. We would like to draw your attention to the fact that we can tow the vehicle on the day of the deal or at any other agreed-upon time.

Junk Car Buyer Vs. Junkyard Vs. Auto Recycler Vs. Auto Wrecker

How to Sell a Car to a Junkyard?

Selling a car to salvage yards in Baltimore, Maryland can be a straightforward procedure provided you partner with a trusted junker. In most cases, all you need to get started is to send a request via the website of a scrap yard in Baltimore, Maryland and wait for a call. Afterward, you schedule a quick appointment with a local buyer representative, get and sign an offer, and arrange a pickup time. Provided that all the documentation is handled by a junker, getting rid of your used car is as simple as making a few calls and appointments.

How Can I Get The Best Deal For My Junk Car?

When you sell a junk car for salvage yards in Baltimore, MD, be aware of several key factors that impact the end cost offered. Among them are the following:

Condition of the Car.

The state of the used car is a crucial price-formation factor. Wrecked, flooded, and just cars in poor conditions are cheaper than ones that still can run. That’s why you should always do timely technical maintenance or at least check your vehicle before contacting auto wreckers.

Mileage.

The state of the used car is a crucial price-formation factor. Wrecked, flooded, and just cars in poor conditions are cheaper than ones that still can run. That’s why you should always do timely technical maintenance or at least check your vehicle before contacting auto wreckers.

Coverage Map in Alabama

Factors that Impact Junk Car Prices in Alabama

Prices for used cars can be different. To understand how much you can receive for your car, you need to know what factors affect its value. When calculating the price for clunkers, companies usually take into account the following aspects:

Car model

Of course, if you're selling a junk car in Alabama in a terrible condition that looks like a bunch of scrap metal, the model does not matter. But if your vehicle has parts that can be used, this can significantly increase its price. The reason is that some models are in high demand on the market and require parts for maintenance and repair. For example, you can get good money for cars of such brands as Toyota, Honda, Nissan, and Ford.
